text: The 1943–44 Tercera División was the 8th edition of the Spanish third national tier. The competition was divided into 2 phases. ==League tables== ===Group I=== ===Group II=== ===Group III=== ===Group IV=== ===Group V=== ====Aragón==== ====Valencia==== =====Group V Final===== ===Group VI=== ===Group VII=== ===Group VIII=== ==Promotion playoff== ===First Round=== ====Group I==== ====Group II==== ===Final Round=== ==Relegation playoff== ===First Round=== ===Final Round=== ==External links== * Official LFP Site Category:Tercera División seasons 3 Spain
title: 1943–44 Tercera División
